details: - Working on new projects using RxSwift with MVVM(C) architecture.
- Coordinating with the team about specs and design, including daily standup and planning meetings.
- As well as maintaining existing iOS (Swift + MVC) applications.
- Handling bug-fixes and writing Unit test cases to increase project code coverage.
- Pushing for an initiative of fixing “broken-windows” for our team to achieve better code quality and stability.
- Working closely with a senior manager on daily pull-request reviews and crash monitoring and handled the implementation of new analytic data points to improve marketing targeting.
- Building custom UI components upon requests from the design team.
- Developing puzzle game using SwiftUI taking advantage over declarative programming architecture and including new UI elements like LazyGrids
- Created application for children in SwiftUI creating custom UI components
- Quiz game for kids to help them learn animal sounds made with AVFoundationKit
- 6 month iOS Developer Learning program which included completion of various projects starting from basics of Swift to building apps using UIKit
- Modules included View Presentations and Segues, Delegate Pattern, Table Views and Navigation
